name: Shaunda C.
testimony: The name Amour en Action, is very fitting for this grassroots organization. When I think of the love and dedication that is poured into each and every mission trip , it inspires me to answer the call for action. The video of last year's mission trip was truly eye opening to the needs of the people of Haiti. May God continue to bless Amour en Action for the great work that He is doing through this organization.
